reference.shortdesc: The reference element is the top-level element for a reference topic. A reference topic can include specialized sections for programming syntax and property tables, as well as standard sections, tables, and examples.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: For information about the purpose and content model of a reference topic, see .

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The reference element is specialized from topic. It is defined in the reference module.
